reviewText: gift item purchased for me, sure its good, still have not watched
Old hard to find baseball movies, does not appear to be remastered, but still watchable
Good quality dvd, enjoy William bendix movies.

Bad transfer on The Jackie Robinson Story. Several video glitches throughout movie.

Did not watch other 2 films yet.

These films aren't easy to get copies of. It's a shame that they receive such shoddy reproduction in this package.
Three fun baseball movies that I found very enjoyable!
Three great movies with totally different story lines...a treat and must for all baseball fans!!!
